title: Critical TypeScript Fixes - Null Safety Issues
description: Fix TS18047 null safety issues across expression node files. Most instances involve 'precedence' variable that is possibly null, with one 'match' variable instance.

tasks.description: Fix null safety in AssignmentNode.ts and FunctionAssignmentNode.ts - Add null checks for 'precedence' variable at AssignmentNode.ts:39 and FunctionAssignmentNode.ts:38
Fix null safety in ConditionalNode.ts - Add null checks for 'precedence' at lines 156, 165, 174, 231, 243, 255 using pattern: if (precedence !== null) or const safePrecedence = precedence ?? 0
Fix null safety in OperatorNode.ts - Add null checks for 'precedence' at lines 132, 160, 182, 240. May use non-null assertion if logically guaranteed, otherwise null check pattern
Fix null safety in RangeNode.ts and RelationalNode.ts - Add null checks for 'precedence' at RangeNode:54,59,64 and RelationalNode:156,209,242
Fix null safety in FunctionNode.ts and operators.ts - Add null check for 'match' at FunctionNode:70 and 'precedence' at operators.ts:313

acceptanceCriteria: npm run compile:ts shows reduced error count
Null checks use consistent pattern throughout codebase
